messages.content: I want to write a Drake song.
Ok, tell me about the intro of the song using some phrases.
will I ever leave you,The answer is no,no-no-no

Question is, will I ever leave you?
The answer is no, no, no-no-no, no, no
No, no-no-no, no, no
No, no, no, no

The answer is no, no, no-no-no, no, no
